Sql.CDATA:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'PMSetup' AND COLUMN_NAME = N'UsrReassignmentNumberingID') BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.PMSetup ADD UsrReassignmentNumberingID nvarchar(10) NULL PRINT 'Column PMSetup.UsrReassignmentNumberingID created' END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'PMSetup' AND COLUMN_NAME = N'UsrAutoReleaseReassignment') BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.PMSetup ADD UsrAutoReleaseReassignment bit NOT NULL DEFAULT(0) PRINT 'Column PMSetup.UsrAutoReleaseReassignment created' END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'PMSetup' AND COLUMN_NAME = N'UsrReassignmentAccountID') BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.PMSetup ADD UsrReassignmentAccountID int NULL PRINT 'Column PMSetup.UsrReassignmentAccountID created' END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'PMSetup' AND COLUMN_NAME = N'UsrReassignmentSubID') BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.PMSetup ADD UsrReassignmentSubID int NULL PRINT 'Column PMSetup.UsrReassignmentSubID created' END
